item.description:
Come down to the English Cellar Alehouse in Providence to play Stump Trivia! A beer, great conversation and a bit of good old fashioned competitive spirit is a terrific way to end the weekend!

The English Cellar Alehouse is a relatively new addition to Providence and boasts an extensive beer list (over 150 kinds) and a pretty good menu: http://www.englishcel....

Trivia begins officially at 8 p.m. but we should probably get there early to get organized and order food and drinks. Please keep in mind that the game takes approximately 2 hours to complete and that teams can't have more than six people. Let's be sure to form our teams prior to the beginning of the trivia!

Don't be shy! Hope to see you there!
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society - Trivia NIght at English Cellar Alehouse!
